venue.name: Baywood Kennels - Canine School of Performing Arts

item.description:
Join us for a fun filled afternoon at the 9th Annual New England French Bulldog Social!

Includes lunch, beverages, goodie bags for all 4-legged guests, raffles, rescue parade, costume contest, and more! Last year there were about 50 French Bulldogs, all very friendly, all allowed to run all over the place in a big fenced field. Bring a couple of picnic chairs, maybe a blanket & beach umbrella, a water bowl, your frenchie's favorite snacks, poop bags, and your camera!! Don't miss out on the fun!

Saturday, May 11th from 11am-4pm
$14 donation per guest, kids under 14 are free
All proceeds from this even to benefit French Bulldog Rescue Network!

Please RSVP to LaurieB76 @ aol.com by May 6th
http://www.facebook.com/events/208149099325931/

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: 9th Annual New England French Bulldog Social
